categories.label: Prohibited Medical Claims
categories.guidance: Do not claim to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent diseases unless authorized and compliant.

categories.label: Restricted Products
categories.guidance: Certain items are prohibited or require approval (weapons, hazardous materials, recalled items, etc.).

categories.label: Counterfeit / Intellectual Property Violations
categories.guidance: No counterfeit, replica, or trademark-infringing products.

categories.label: Misleading Pricing / Sales Claims
categories.guidance: Follow Amazonâ€™s pricing policies; avoid unverifiable savings claims.

categories.label: Review Manipulation
categories.guidance: Do not ask customers for positive reviews or offer incentives.

categories.label: Keyword Stuffing
categories.guidance: Avoid irrelevant keywords or repetitive stuffing in titles, bullets, and search terms.

hints.title: Use only factual, relevant keywords; avoid exaggerated claims.
hints.description: Focus on clear benefits and features; avoid restricted terms.
hints.bullet_points: Highlight top features; one per bullet.
